title.rendered: DIONNE PHILLIPS ON GOOD MORNING LALA LAND

content.rendered:
DIONNE PHILLIPS ON GOOD MORNING LALA LAND

Happy September beauties! I’m excited to be back on TV talking about all things lashes! I’m doing a live demonstration on how to apply false lashes on Good Morning LaLa Land TV…check out the video below for how-to tips. Pro Tip: After putting the glue on false lashes wait a bit until the glue gets tacky before applying it to your lash line.

Check out the video and let me know if you have any beauty and lash questions on my blog and on my Instagram @dlashes 

Don’t forget to make your lash extensions appointments in advance since the calendar quickly fills up. You can also shop for my favorite lashes and beauty products here.

Also, to get your fashion fix…..check out all my previous blog posts below. I love fashion and all things beauty! 😉

LOVE DIONNE
